com.lightattachment
Class AttachmentSaver

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.lightattachment.AttachmentSaver
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class AttachmentSaver
extends java.lang.Thread

Send the attachments of its queue to e-BigSend.

Version:
0.1a
Author:
Benoit Giannangeli

private java.util.ArrayList<MailSet> toSaveQueue

Constructor Detail

AttachmentSaver

public AttachmentSaver(MailManager manager)
Build the AttachmentSaver (needs lightattachment.xml config file).

Parameters:
manager - the MailManager to send the modified mails back
Method Detail

selectSave

public AttachmentSaver.SaveThread selectSave()
Select a SaveThread in savePool. If the pool is empty, creates a new thread and return it. Else if one the thread is free, return it. Else if limit not reached, creates a new thread and return it. Else select the thread with the smaller queue and return it.

Returns:
the selected SaveThread

selectByHost

public AttachmentSaver.SaveByHostThread selectByHost()
Select a SaveByHostThread in byhostPool. If the pool is empty, creates a new thread and return it. Else if one the thread is free, return it. Else if limit not reached, creates a new thread and return it. Else select the thread with the smaller queue and return it.

Returns:
the selected SaveByHostThread

push

public void push(MailSet mail)
Push a MailSet to the saved queue.

Parameters:
mail - the MailSet to push into the queue

peek

private MailSet peek()
Return the first value of the save queue without removing it.

Returns:
the first value of the save queue

pop

private MailSet pop()
Return the first value of the save queue and remove it.

Returns:
the first value of the save queue

selectEBigSend

private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectEBigSend(java.lang.String to)
Select the e-BigSend URL in functions of the target address of the message. See lightattachment.xml to add other e-BigSend URL.

Parameters:
to - the target adress of the message (a single one)
Returns:
the selected e-BigSend URL

selectEBigSends

private java.util.HashMap<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>,java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String>> selectEBigSends(java.lang.String to)
Select e-BigSend URL for several recipient.

Parameters:
to - a list of recipient separated by a coma
Returns:
list of possible hosts associated to several recipient
